channel.title: Reading on Jayesh Nair
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Jayesh Nair

item.title: Logs '26
item.description: Jan 1 ‘26. Happy New Year! My last log was posted in October. I didn’t feel the intellectual growth compared to the year 2024. That being said, there are a few things that I was happy about. Firstly, this website itself. I’ve had a website, or some place to host writings in the past, but this was the first time I felt like calling something “a home on the internet” (yes, it sounds cheeky).

item.title: Logs '25
item.description: Oct 25 ‘25. Been reading the series Exiting Modernity by Meta-Nomad. Oct 14 ‘25. Read a decent write up on Alec Radford. For anyone who know’s the field, the man is a prolific researcher. His work spans Audio (Generative Audio), Speech (Whisper) , Text (GPT1, GPT2) to Vision (CLIP). I’m still not up to do much work today. So, I have instead been watching a series of videos on the Secret History by the Predictive History YouTube channel.
